Eight evaluable subject ( n=8 ) chronic stable heart failure moderate renal impairment randomize ( 1:1 ) receive cenderitide placebo . Enrolled subject begin Infusion Period A receive 7 day continuous , subcutaneous , dose-escalating infusion cenderitide placebo via Insulet Drug Delivery System . Enrolled subject cross Infusion Period B receive 7 day continuous , subcutaneous , dose-escalating infusion cenderitide placebo .
